feature_descriptions.premium_features: Premium features for selected users including enhanced banking services, higher limits, and exclusive tools.
feature_descriptions.premium_loans: High-limit loans with lower interest rates for users with excellent credit scores.
feature_descriptions.investment_portfolio: Advanced investment management features for premium users.
feature_descriptions.wealth_manager: Personalized financial advice and wealth management recommendations.
feature_descriptions.market_analysis: Real-time market trend analysis and investment opportunities.
feature_descriptions.custom_cards: Customizable virtual credit and debit card designs for premium users.
feature_descriptions.early_access: Early access to new features before general release.
feature_descriptions.beta_features: Experimental features in beta testing phase.
feature_descriptions.new_dashboard: New interactive dashboard with enhanced visualization and features.
